original_text: And Moses said unto Aaron and to his sons, Boil the flesh at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation: and there eat it with the bread that is in the basket of consecrations, as I commanded, saying, Aaron and his sons shall eat it.
korean_text: 모세가 아론과 그의 아들들에게 이르되 내게 이미 명령하시기를 아론과 그의 아들들은 먹으라 하셨은즉 너희는 회막 문에서 그 고기를 삶아 위임식 광주리 안의 떡과 아울러 그 곳에서 먹고

sentences.original_text: And Moses said unto Aaron and to his sons
Boil the flesh at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
and there eat it with the bread
that is in the basket of consecrations
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 구별함의 바구니 안에 있는 떡이니라

sentences.original_text: saying, Aaron and his sons shall eat it
